Public Remarks: **Repriced to sell. Adorable and cozy casita in the St. Leo's Neighborhood. This is a solidly built 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom casita that has 852 sq.ft on a nice 5,070 sq ft lot. It has been freshly painted, the hardwood floors have been beautifully refinished, the bathroom has been tastefully remodeled and this home is ready to be embraced by the new owners. The property allows for a quiet lifestyle, but also would be ideal for entertaining, with a spacious backyard that has several fruit trees. There is also an indoor laundry room. The location is excellent whether you're walking, riding a bike or taking a short drive. Local walking attractions include the restaurants and shops along The Alameda, Downtown San Jose, SAP Arena, Diridon Station (Amtrek/Caltrain), Guadalupe River Trail and Wholefoods. The proposed and transformative Google Village is within minutes of this property. As well, Santana Row, Mineta International Airport, San Jose State University and Santa Clara University are a quick drive away. There is easy access to roadways for commutes. This is truly a great opportunity for buyers looking to live in the St. Leo's Neighborhood. **We are also selling the 4 bedroom/2 bathroom home right next door at 1094 W. San Fernando.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this charming Hester Park home located in the Rose Garden, offering a delightful blend of comfort and character. Large picture windows adorn the living and dining rooms, infusing the space with natural light and serene views. Hardwood floors grace the entry, living, dining, and hallway areas, while cozy wood flooring enhances the bedrooms. The living room features a fireplace surrounded by bookcases, complemented by windows that welcome warm sunlight indoors. Recessed ceilings add elegance to the entry, living, and dining rooms. Step into the kitchen, where a charming swinging door, newly glazed sink and counters, new tile flooring, and a gas stove create an inviting culinary space.The updated bathroom offers double sinks, a tub with shower, and tiled flooring for a fresh feel. A spacious laundry room adds convenience to daily routines. Recent updates include freshly painted interiors and exteriors, along with new landscaping featuring lush sod and fruit trees. For storage or workspace, a detached single-car garage and basement provides versatility. Enjoy walking to restaurants and parks, with proximity to freeways 880 and 280, as well as Diridon Station. Walk Score: 80 | Bike Score: 79 San Jose Unified School District: Trace Elementary, Hoover Middle, Lincoln High

Public Remarks: NEW PRICE. Rare opportunity to own a stunning and historically significant home.The home and garden were designed by Ralph Wyckoff (1883-1956), a San Jose architect who, along with his wife and daughter, lived in the home. Wyckoff also designed the St. James Post Office in downtown San Jose (listed on the National Register of Historic Places), the Science Bldg. at SJ State as well as many other architecturally significant buildings in the Bay Area. Spacious master bedroom and bath. Formal dining room. The gourmet kitchen flows into the family room and out through french doors to the beautiful patio and gardens! Great for outdoor enjoyment, a jewel box of a garden awaits. Lush green landscaping, paved patios to relax on, a built-in brick fireplace and original pond. It is a peaceful and private sun-filled oasis. This beautiful refuge perfectly complements the Spanish Eclectic home and has a history matching that of many homes in the neighborhood. 3 bedrooms, 2 baths and office/sunroom.

Close to highways, light rail, the train, schools, Valley Fair, Santana Row, the Rose Garden, Whole Foods & the future Downtown Google West Village.

Public Remarks: Charming Home in Desirable Saint Leo's Neighborhood. This home with great potential sits on a large, rectangular lot offering an excellent opportunity to add an ADU in the spacious backyard. Enjoy the convenience of walking to local amenities. Whole Foods is nearby for all your grocery needs, & Diridon Station Caltrain/VTA/Amtrak is within walking distance, making commuting easy. Popular dining spots like The Breakfast Club, Luna Mexican Kitchen, Crema, & Peet's Coffee are also close by. Entertainment options abound. SAP Center is just a short stroll away for Sharks hockey games or concerts, and San Pedro Square offers vibrant nightlife & dining within easy walking distance. Take a bike ride to Downtown Willow Glen & enjoy its restaurants and annual block events. Living here means being close to major employers in downtown San Jose, such as Adobe, Ernst & Young, Deloitte, Zoom, and WeWork. The neighborhood is undergoing significant revitalization as part of the Diridon Station Area Plan, The Alameda Regional Transit Urban Villages Plan, and the Local Transit Urban Villages Plan.This is a fantastic opportunity to invest in a charming, convenient, and growing community. Dont miss the chance to transform this property into your dream home.

Quintessential California living in this expanded bungalow style home with a gourmet kitchen that was beautifully renovated and expanded in 2007 with granite, ample cabinets and laundry area. Large remodeled master suite retreat with fireplace, high ceiling, double door access to backyard, walk in closet, and updated bathroom. Gleaming hardwood floors with plush carpet in bedrooms. There is electrified Caltrain coming along with High-Speed Rail close by making the home idea for commuting and that urban lifestyle where you walk to coffee on your way to the train then walk to breakfast on the weekend. Public Remarks: Situated in the coveted Rose Garden community, this stunning Summerhill home boasts architectural details such as a grand foyer, a spectacular spiral staircase, soaring ceilings and ample windows. Spacious formal dining and living areas as well as an open family room connected to the kitchen and breakfast nook. French doors enhance the seamless indoor/outdoor living spaces. Imagine dining and relaxing in the warm sun on your flagstone patio while overlooking the serene pool/spa with water features. Large lower level den could be used as a 5th bedroom while the downstairs powder room could be converted to a full bath. Well-appointed Kitchen with granite counters, an island with a prep sink, a Sub-Zero refrigerator, gas range, a breakfast nook and a pantry. Sizable primary suite with retreat area, gas fireplace, & a generous walk-in California Closet. Luxurious primary bathroom complete with soaking tub, dual sinks, and a shower stall. Plantation shutters, rich Brazilian hardwood floors, central a/c. Local amenities include: The Rose Garden Park, the library, schools, Farmers Market, Zanotto's. Easy access to Highways 880, 280, and 87, Cupertino, Santa Clara, downtown, trains/light rail transit, the airport, Valley Fair, Santa Row, Wholefoods, Bellarmine, SCU.

The primary bathroom awaits its owners to enjoy a soaking tub, dual vanity sink and stand alone glass shower. Numerous French doors & large picture windows inspire indoor/outdoor living. Spacious & low maintenance yard. Minutes from Santana Row, Valley Fair, O'Connor Hospital, schools, 280/17/880 & more, this home has plenty to offer!

Public Remarks: Tenant Occupied. Home sits towards the rear of the lot. There is at least four to six parking spaces available in the front, it would also be great for a recreational vehicle parking. The home has random oak plank flooring in the living room and dining area. The kitchen was remodeled about 1990. The laundry room is off of the kitchen. One bedroom has a door to the backyard. The home was originally built in 1939 and moved to this location in 1978 from Mt. View. Therefore the foundation is a 1978 foundation. Because of the front parking availability, it may be good for a home office in which a number of cars need to be parked.
